Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.decorations

Class MyShelfieInnerLighting

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.decorations.MyShelfieInnerLighting
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyShelfieDecoration
public class MyShelfieInnerLighting extends Object implements MyShelfieDecoration
Represents an inner lighting decoration for a component in the graphical user interface. This class implements the `MyShelfieDecoration` interface.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emamuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

  • Constructor Details

    • MyShelfieInnerLighting

      public MyShelfieInnerLighting()
      Constructs a new `MyShelfieInnerLighting` decoration. It creates a lighting effect with a distant light source.
